memberdef.name: MKDIR
RENAME
memberdef.initializer: do{ \ errno = 0; \ if ( rename(a,b) != 0 ){ \ char ErrorString[600]; \ sprintf(ErrorString,"FILE %s FUNC %s:%d Cannot rename : %s to %s",__FILE__,__FUNCTION__,__LINE__,a, b); \ FTI_Print(ErrorString, FTI_EROR); \ errno = 0; \ return FTI_NSCS; \ } \ }while(0)

memberdef.name: FREAD
memberdef.initializer: do{ \ bytes = fread(buff, size, number, fd); \ if (ferror(fd)) { \ char ErrorString[400]; \ sprintf(ErrorString,"FILE %s FUNC %s:%d Error Reading File Bytes Read : %ld",__FILE__,__FUNCTION__,__LINE__, (long)bytes); \ FTI_Print(ErrorString, FTI_EROR); \ cleanup(format,__VA_ARGS__,NULL); \ fclose(fd); \ return errorCode; \ } \ }while(0)

memberdef.name: FWRITE
memberdef.initializer: do{ \ bytes = fwrite(buff, size, number, fd); \ if (ferror(fd)) { \ char ErrorString[400]; \ sprintf(ErrorString,"FILE %s FUNC %s:%d Error Writing File Bytes Written : %ld",__FILE__,__FUNCTION__,__LINE__,(long)bytes); \ FTI_Print(ErrorString, FTI_EROR); \ cleanup(format,__VA_ARGS__,NULL); \ fclose(fd); \ return errorCode; \ } \ }while(0)
